sentences.sContent: She covered her face, rocking to and fro in her grief.
sentences.sCn: 她捂住脸，悲痛得身体不住地来回晃动。

sentences.sContent: The waves rocked the boat from side to side .
Paul sat gently rocking the child in his arms.
sentences.sCn: 保罗坐着，轻轻摇晃怀里的孩子。

sentences.sContent: Jim rocked with laughter when he heard what had happened.
sentences.sCn: 吉姆听了发生的事情后笑得前仰后合。
